package.name: markdown-shortcuts
package.author: JosÃ© Ferreira
package.description: A simple package to make writing Markdown easier
package.title: Markdown shortcuts

manifest.author: JosÃ© Ferreira
manifest.description: A simple package to make writing Markdown easier
manifest.name: markdown-shortcuts
manifest.title: Markdown shortcuts

value.readme:
# Available matches | Trigger | Replace | |--------------|--------------------------------------------------------| | :block: | \```ðŸ–°\n``` | | :code: | \`ðŸ–°` | | :h1: | # | | :h2: | ## | | :h3: | ### | | :h4: | #### | | :h5: | ##### | | :h6: | ###### | | :bold: | \*\*ðŸ–°** | | :italic: | \*ðŸ–°\* | | :strike: | \~\~ðŸ–°~~ | | :url: | \[ðŸ–°]() | | :image: | !\[](ðŸ–°) | | :horizontal: | ___\n | | :task: | - [ ] | | :donetask: | - [x] | | :collapse: | \
\ðŸ–°\\n\

\n\n\

\n\
| **Note: The ðŸ–° symbol is where your mouse cursor will be after the trigger and \n represents a new line.**

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
name: markdown-shortcuts
parent: default

matches:
  - triggers: [":block:", ":mb:"]
    replace: |-
        ```$|$
        ```
    force_clipboard: true

  - triggers: [":code:", ":mc:"]
    replace: |-
        `$|$`
    force_clipboard: true

  - trigger: ":h1:"
    replace: "#"

  - trigger: ":h2:"
    replace: "##"

  - trigger: ":h3:"
    replace: "###"

  - trigger: ":h4:"
    replace: "####"

  - trigger: ":h5:"
    replace: "#####"

  - trigger: ":h6:"
    replace: "######"

  - trigger: ":bold:"
    replace: "**$|$**"

  - trigger: ":italic:"
    replace: "*$|$*"

  - trigger: ":strike:"
    replace: "~~$|$~~"

  - trigger: ":url:"
    replace: "[$|$]()"

  - triggers: [":image:", ":img:"]
    replace: "![]($|$)"

  - triggers: [":horizontal:", ":mh:"]
    replace: "___"

  - triggers: [":task:", ":mt:"]
    replace: "- [ ] "

  - triggers: [":taskdone:", ":mtd:"]
    replace: "- [x] "

  - triggers: [":collapse:", ":mcol:"]
    replace: |-
        <details>
        <summary></summary>

        $|$
        </details>
    force_clipboard: true
